rationale: The current TUI uses hardcoded colors (cyan, magenta, red, green) which may be inaccessible to users with color vision deficiencies (especially red/green color blindness). A theme system would improve accessibility and allow personalization.
problemSolved:
Colors are hardcoded in TranscriptViewer.ts:
- Human agents: cyan
- Planner agents: magenta
- Critic agents: red (problematic for red/green color blindness)
- Default agents: green
- Error messages: red
- Success messages: green
- History mode: magenta background

No theme configuration exists in schema.ts.
